posts.post_content:
I am selling 6 T206s - listed below. Asking $195 shipped (net to me) for the lot. I would consider breaking up the lot if you're interested in individual cards. I will add pictures tonight when I get home from work. Conditions are listed in parentheses. Some were slabbed and I freed them, but still have the label, and those will ship with them.

Cy Seymour (G/VG) - Sovereign 350 Apple Green
Francis Pfeffer (G/VG) - Sweet Caporal 460 Fact. 42
Bill Malarkey (F) - American Beauty 350 w/ Frame
Russ Ford (G/VG) - Sweet Caporal 350-460 Fact. 42
Mike Donlin (G/VG) - Polar Bear
Neal Ball (G/VG) - Old Mill

PM or Email me at [url]kmayusa6060@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks!

Sold. 

To quote the great Scott (pun intended), "Fun fun :rolleyes:"
